en.registration.title: First, enter your email.
en.registration.content: Just one more mail - a quick confirmation - before you say goodbye to overstuffed inboxes for good.
en.registration.form.email.invalid-message: The input is not valid E-mail!
en.registration.form.button.label: Confirm
en.verification.alert.message.send-mail-aga: We have sent code again, plese check you inbox.
en.verification.title: Check your email!
en.verification.content: We've sent a 6-digit confirmation code to {userMail}.It will expire shortly.So enter it soon.
en.verification.form.message: Keep this windown open while checking for your code. Remember to try your spam folder!
en.account-settings.title: Choose a password.
en.account-settings.content: you'll use your email address and a password to sign in into JHook
en.account-settings.footer.text1: By continuing, you're agreeing to our
en.account-settings.form.check.label: It's okay to send me email with {companyName} tips, news, and offers.
en.account-settings.form.button.label: Done
